title: Ticket #6727: review/fix condor_submit -i error messages
description:
Lauren was recently working side-by-side with a user who was attempting to submit an interactive job, and a number of error messages showed up (submission was unsuccessful) that were very confusing.

While not all of these were captured, the below is a good example:

"Failed to get response to CREATE_JOB_OWNER_SEC_SESSION from starter"
